mapper.insert: insert into message (id, content, create_time, send_id, target_id, type, status, session_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{targetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update message set content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_id = #{sendId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, content, create_time, send_id, target_id, type, status, session_id from message
